issue.title: [Archery][CI] Add possibility to archery crossbow reports to send a Zulip notification report via a webhook
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16378](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16378). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As part of improving our nightly reports we can add to crossbow the ability to send a slack message with the status of the nightly builds using a Zulip webhook for easy integration with any Zulip platform.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16378?focusedCommentId=17531779) by Raúl Cumplido (raulcd):*
This was resolved together with ARROW-16357 and we are now posting the nightly report message to Zulip
